text: The Tomb of Darius II are Catacomb located in Marvdasht.This tomb is part of the Naqsh-e Rostam. == Gallery == File:Naqsh-e Rustam 01.jpg File:20101229 Naqsh e Rostam Shiraz Iran Panorama.jpg File:The Islamic Republic 049 (8498647398).jpg File:Tomb of Darius II, Naqsh-e Rustam 02.jpg ==Sources== Category:Naqsh-e Rustam Category:Tourist attractions in Fars Province Category:Mausoleums in Iran Category:Buildings and structures in Fars Province Category:Achaemenid architecture
title: Tomb of Darius II
